html: Redeemed—Shall be delivered from all their enemies and calamities. With—Or, by judgment, that is, by God's righteous judgment, purging out those wicked and incorrigible Jews, and destroying their unmerciful enemies. Converts—Heb. her returners, those of them who shall come out of captivity into their own land. Righteousness—Or, by righteousness, either by my faithfulness, in keeping my promise, or by my goodness.
